title: 12YA: The GREAT ADVENTURE
body_text:
I vividly remember sitting in Fins with Valerie and Lauren, expressing my desire and need to start a dodgeball league. I jotted some notes and names and, well, hoped for the best.
Labor Day weekend of 2005 wasn't too far away at that point so I made a few phone calls and grabbed the equipment .. that was 12 years ago and trust me, you just can't plan the amount of friendships, relationships, and overall success we've experienced.
I say this often, but I will never forget to express my gratitude to all of you. With all that said, we have an amazing event in just weeks time during, you guessed it, Labor Day weekend - September 2 to be exact!
Please enjoy this promotional music video highlighting various events during ECD's "Reunion Era" from 2014 to 2017 featuring each of the leading 12YA generals - Chris Adams, Kevin Megill, Kevin Adams, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Tom Adams, and John Tronolone - as well as an incredible cast of ECD characters: DiBuccio, Pierce, Edwards, Stopa, Sputz, Kerr, Wolf, Bertsch, Cornero, Spengeman, Mullins, Katz, Basista, and many more!
body_html:
I vividly remember sitting in Fins with Valerie and Lauren, expressing my desire and need to start a dodgeball league. I jotted some notes and names and, well, hoped for the best.

Labor Day weekend of 2005 wasn't too far away at that point so I made a few phone calls and grabbed the equipment .. that was 12 years ago and trust me, you just can't plan the amount of friendships, relationships, and overall success we've experienced.

I say this often, but I will never forget to express my gratitude to all of you. With all that said, we have an amazing event in just weeks time during, you guessed it, Labor Day weekend - September 2 to be exact!

Please enjoy this promotional music video highlighting various events during ECD's "Reunion Era" from 2014 to 2017 featuring each of the leading 12YA generals - Chris Adams, Kevin Megill, Kevin Adams, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Tom Adams, and John Tronolone - as well as an incredible cast of ECD characters: DiBuccio, Pierce, Edwards, Stopa, Sputz, Kerr, Wolf, Bertsch, Cornero, Spengeman, Mullins, Katz, Basista, and many more!
